entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
